title: Sensi Watch for WatchMaker
summary: Relive the 90's on your watch with this tribute to Sensible Soccer.
description: You will need to install the WATCHMAKER PREMIUM APP (http://goo.gl/FMxUfY) to use this watch face  Relive the 90's on your watch with this tribute to Sensible Soccer.  Features=======★ Animated players who run off the pitch with the change of time★ Weather effects based on your current location★ Looks great on both round and square faces
descriptionHTML:
You will need to install the WATCHMAKER PREMIUM APP (http://goo.gl/FMxUfY) to use this watch face

Relive the 90's on your watch with this tribute to Sensible Soccer.

Features
=======
★ Animated players who run off the pitch with the change of time
★ Weather effects based on your current location
★ Looks great on both round and square faces
comments: charge 2ce? Downloaded this watch face as looks great but after spending  £1 it won't work unless you install another app for £2 so you have to spend £3 for a watch face.
